name: SAVIOR (itch) (Misty_Game)
description:
What holds those strange balls are fragile.

SYNOPSIS:

You are a young man who, together with your friend Jhonas, believe that the world is corrupted by creatures that use the internet to feed on the vital force of people who are in front of a computer, you created glasses to see these creatures and called them of "Clikes", and you two try to save people from this evil, destroying the local servers that are the source of life for these beings.

average game length: 5 minute;

CONTROLS:

WSAD - WALK

E - INTERACT/NEXT DIALOGUE

F - GLASSES

GLASSES:

The glasses have the function of allowing Jhonas and David to see the creatures.

WARNING:

The game contains bright lights and tight spaces, recommended to play with the brightness on medium so as not to cause damage to sensitive eyes.
